title: Ensure enabling of external data sharing is restricted
description: Restrict enabling of external data sharing in Microsoft Fabric to prevent data leakage to unauthorized parties.
displayName: Ensure enabling of external data sharing is restricted
rationale: Restricting external data sharing helps prevent data leakage and ensures that only authorized users can share data outside the organization.
impact: Users may be unable to share data externally unless explicitly allowed, which may affect collaboration with external partners.

remediation.text:
1. Navigate to Microsoft Fabric https://app.powerbi.com/admin-portal
2. Select Tenant settings.
3. Scroll to Export and Sharing settings.
4. Restrict external data sharing as per organizational policy.
